Uses of Class
purchasable.items.Item

Packages that use Item
Package
Description
day
This package contains classes that define each day of the game - Battle.java, Day.java, and Shop.java
generators
This package contains generators to randomly generate an Item or a Monster.
gui
This package contains the GameEnvironment, and all the GUI classes.
player
This package contains information that is unique to the player - classes Inventory, Player, PlayerScore and Team.
purchasable.items
The Item package containing all the various item types and functionality.
purchasable.items.armors
The Armor package which contains the different Armor items.
purchasable.items.food
The Food package which contains the different types of Food items.
purchasable.items.weapons
The Weapons package containing the different types of weapons.
